headline: L3Harris (LHX) Boosted by Defense Tech Innovation and Increased Orders
summary: L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) is one of the best military tech stocks to buy now. On July 29, Barclays raised its price target on L3Harris Technologies, Inc. (NYSE:LHX) from $255 to $305, reiterating an Overweight rating after updating its financial model following the company’s latest earnings report. With shares currently trading at $274.14, the new target […]
